## Chart Features <img src="images/plotly.png" width="auto" height="100" align="right" />

***

The provided charts come with a number of features that can be used to enhance the user experience.

These features include:

- **Zooming**: The user can zoom in on a specific area of the chart by clicking and dragging the mouse over the area they want to zoom in on. To reset the zoom, the user can double click on the chart.

- **Panning**: The user can pan the chart by clicking and dragging the mouse over the chart.

- **Hovering**: The user can hover over a data point to see more information about that point.

- **Data Selection**: The user can select a specific data point by clicking on it. This will highlight the data point and show more information about it.

- **Data Filtering**: The user can filter the data by clicking on the legend. This will hide or show the data associated with that legend item.

***

<center>

*Charts displayed using [Plotly](https://plotly.com/) and the [Plotly R Library](https://plotly.com/r/).*

</center>
